name: hardened
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ before noun ] used to describe someone who has had a lot of bad experiences and as a result no longer gets upset or shocked: hardened detectives/reporters
[ before noun ] no longer likely to change a bad way of life or feel sorry about it: a hardened criminal be/become hardened to something
to develop a way of dealing with a sad situation so that it no longer upsets you: You see all sorts of terrible things when you're a nurse so you become hardened to it.
